document_data.mainbody:
Penni was a wealthy inhabitants of Baldurs Gate in the 15 century DR.
In the , Penni was accounted with the leven Lady Whitburn. Penni was known for wearing fanciful hats she purchased in the Lower City of the Gate. During the Absolute crisis, Lady Whitburn and her husband traveled to the Lower City, searching for the hat shop frequented by Penni..
